it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities

Class GenericEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.GenericEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateOfCalendar, EntityWithLongKey, Location, Period, RSAEncryption, TypeOfEvent, User, UserDevice

    public abstract class GenericEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the main entity class, it is to be extended by all entity classes of Travlendar+ The class implements the Serializable interface, since is to be implemented by all entities classes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • load

        public static <T,S> T load(java.lang.Class<T> entityClass,
                           S key)
                    throws EntityNotFoundException
        This method allows to load any entity from the database
        Type Parameters:
        T - The specific entity to be loaded
        S - the type of the entity key
        Parameters:
        entityClass - the class to be read
        key - his primary key
        Returns:
        the requested entity
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if the entity does not exist in the database

        the entity manager which will handle the transaction

          throws javax.persistence.EntityExistsException
